verses.verse: The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3927>Lemuel,<s%> the <S%H4853>prophecy<s%> that his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H3256>taught<s%> him.
<S%H4100>What,<s%> my <S%H1248>son?<s%> and <S%H4100>what,<s%> the <S%H1248>son<s%> of my <S%H990>womb?<s%> and <S%H4100>what,<s%> the <S%H1248>son<s%> of my <S%H5088>vows?<s%>
<S%H5414>Give<s%> not your <S%H2428>strength<s%> to <S%H802>women,<s%> nor your <S%H1870>ways<s%> to that which <S%H4229>destroys<s%> <S%H4428>kings.<s%>
It is not for <S%H4428>kings,<s%> O <S%H3927>Lemuel,<s%> it is not for <S%H4428>kings<s%> to <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine;<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> for <S%H7336>princes<s%> strong <S%H7941>drink:<s%>
<S%H6435>Lest<s%> they <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H2710>law,<s%> and <S%H8138>pervert<s%> the <S%H1779>judgment<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> of the <S%H6040>afflicted.<s%>
<S%H5414>Give<s%> strong <S%H7941>drink<s%> to him that is <S%H4131>ready<s%> to <S%H6>perish,<s%> and <S%H3196>wine<s%> to those that be of <S%H4751>heavy<s%> <S%H5315>hearts.<s%>
Let him <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and <S%H7911>forget<s%> his <S%H7389>poverty,<s%> and <S%H2142>remember<s%> his <S%H5999>misery<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more.<s%>
<S%H6605>Open<s%> your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> for the <S%H483>dumb<s%> in the <S%H1779>cause<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> such as are <S%H1121>appointed<s%> to <S%H2475>destruction.<s%>
<S%H6605>Open<s%> your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H6664>righteously,<s%> and <S%H1777>plead<s%> the cause of the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy.<s%>
<S%H4310>Who<s%> can <S%H4672>find<s%> a <S%H2428>virtuous<s%> <S%H802>woman?<s%> for her <S%H4377>price<s%> is <S%H7350>far<s%> above <S%H6443>rubies.<s%>
The <S%H3820>heart<s%> of her <S%H1167>husband<s%> does safely <S%H982>trust<s%> in her, so that he shall have <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2637>need<s%> of <S%H7998>spoil.<s%>
She will <S%H1580>do<s%> him <S%H2896>good<s%> and not <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of her <S%H2416>life.<s%>
She <S%H1875>seeks<s%> <S%H6785>wool,<s%> and <S%H6593>flax,<s%> and <S%H6213>works<s%> <S%H2656>willingly<s%> with her <S%H3709>hands.<s%>
She is like the <S%H5503>merchants'<s%> <S%H591>ships;<s%> she <S%H935>brings<s%> her <S%H3899>food<s%> from <S%H4801>afar.<s%>

She <S%H6965>rises<s%> also while it is <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H2964>meat<s%> to her <S%H1004>household,<s%> and a <S%H2706>portion<s%> to her <S%H5291>maidens.<s%>
She <S%H2161>considers<s%> a <S%H7704>field,<s%> and <S%H3947>buys<s%> it: with the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of her <S%H3709>hands<s%> she <S%H5195>plants<s%> a <S%H3754>vineyard.<s%>
She <S%H2296>girds<s%> her <S%H4975>loins<s%> with <S%H5797>strength,<s%> and <S%H553>strengthens<s%> her <S%H2220>arms.<s%>
She <S%H2938>perceives<s%> that her <S%H5504>merchandise<s%> is <S%H2896>good:<s%> her <S%H5216>candle<s%> <S%H3518>goes<s%> not out by <S%H3915>night.<s%>
She <S%H7971>lays<s%> her <S%H3027>hands<s%> to the <S%H3601>spindle,<s%> and her <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H8551>hold<s%> the <S%H6418>distaff.<s%>
She <S%H6566>stretches<s%> out her <S%H3709>hand<s%> to the <S%H6041>poor;<s%> yes, she <S%H7971>reaches<s%> <S%H6566>forth<s%> her <S%H3027>hands<s%> to the <S%H34>needy.<s%>
She is not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of the <S%H7950>snow<s%> for her <S%H1004>household:<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H1004>household<s%> are <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H8144>scarlet.<s%>
She <S%H6213>makes<s%> herself <S%H4765>coverings<s%> of tapestry; her <S%H3830>clothing<s%> is <S%H8336>silk<s%> and <S%H713>purple.<s%>
Her <S%H1167>husband<s%> is <S%H3045>known<s%> in the <S%H8179>gates,<s%> when he <S%H3427>sits<s%> <S%H5973>among<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>
She <S%H6213>makes<s%> fine <S%H5466>linen,<s%> and <S%H4376>sells<s%> it; and <S%H5414>delivers<s%> <S%H2290>girdles<s%> to the <S%H5503>merchant.<s%>
<S%H5797>Strength<s%> and <S%H1926>honor<s%> are her <S%H3830>clothing;<s%> and she shall <S%H7832>rejoice<s%> in <S%H3117>time<s%> to <S%H314>come.<s%>
She <S%H6605>opens<s%> her <S%H6310>mouth<s%> with <S%H2451>wisdom;<s%> and in her <S%H3956>tongue<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H2617>kindness.<s%>
She <S%H6822>looks<s%> <S%H6822>well<s%> to the <S%H1979>ways<s%> of her <S%H1004>household,<s%> and <S%H398>eats<s%> not the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H6104>idleness.<s%>
Her <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H6965>arise<s%> up, and <S%H833>call<s%> her <S%H833>blessed;<s%> her <S%H1167>husband<s%> also, and he <S%H1984>praises<s%> her.
<S%H7227>Many<s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%> have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2428>virtuously,<s%> but you <S%H5927>excel<s%> them <S%H3605>all.<s%>
<S%H2580>Favor<s%> is <S%H8267>deceitful,<s%> and <S%H3308>beauty<s%> is <S%H1892>vain:<s%> but a <S%H802>woman<s%> that <S%H3373>fears<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> she shall be <S%H1984>praised.<s%>
<S%H5414>Give<s%> her of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of her <S%H3027>hands;<s%> and let her own <S%H4639>works<s%> <S%H1984>praise<s%> her in the <S%H8179>gates.<s%>
